```{python}
import requests

def get_random_quote():
    response = requests.get("https://api.quotable.io/random", verify=False)
    if response.status_code == 200:
        data = response.json()
        return f"{data['content']} - {data['author']}"
    else:
        return "Failed to fetch a quote."

print(get_random_quote())
```
